resources.string:
* Load Model: Load models from your device storage (you can find a lot in Internet. Just download them to your device). Please load only wavefront object files (*.obj). If the model file (.obj) is referencing any materials file (*.mtl) be sure its in the same folder; same applies for texture files (*.jpg, *.bmp) being referenced in the material file.

.* Models: Included with the app there is some models I downloaded from Internet (www.turbosquid.com), and serves as example of wavefront files that can be loaded with the app.

* Demo: This is a demo of what can be done with the app. It basically loads several models to show usage of draw modes, colors, textures and loading of files. Serves basically to test the application when Im developing.

* Help: This instructions page

* About: Credits of this app.


Viewer: Once you load a model, you can pinch to zoom, rotate the camera with your finger and rotate the screen with 2 fingers

In the action bar you will also find 2 buttons: 1 for toggling the wireframe draw mode and 1 for toggling the bounding boxes.
* Currently only supported within * Orlando, Florida area
